content: I have had a wallet stolen by a forum member,  10,000 btc which they had no right to move. The wallet was claimed and based on my data. i need a arbitrator to be involved and resolve the low life theft. if not then are there any other options besides getting either attorneys involved? or calling the SS  to raid his house and seize his assets which would burn the wallet and i will do this ... no one will get it. This has impacted my life and my wifes cancer treatments which is putting her at risk. I dont have time anymore.. so if you have a suggestion please let me know soon. I do have a longer dissertation and proof which i can post... he can end up with something,.. or it will be nothing overall one way or another. He was tasked with resolving a conversion , that is all and had no other contribution so 1% if that... Mods why is a member allowed to stay on this forum when he has lied and stolen a wallet? Is that not a ban offense? Additionally i did not vet the person which also fed into trusting him ...

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: MikeJ_NpC on February 14, 2023, 08:31:46 PMI have had a wallet stolen by a forum member,  10,000 btc which they had no right to move. The wallet was claimed and based on my data. i need a arbitrator to be involved and resolve the low life theft. I am sorry to hear about your situation, if it is true, but I must remind you that making threats or harassing someone is not an appropriate or legal way to handle this matter. That will only make things worse for you in the long run. If you believe that you have been the victim of theft, you should file a police report and seek legal counsel.Quote from: MikeJ_NpC on February 14, 2023, 08:31:46 PMMods why is a member allowed to stay on this forum when he has lied and stolen a wallet? Is that not a ban offense? Additionally i did not vet the person which also fed into trusting him ...It's not the mods' responsibility to get involved in arguments between users, and they definitely do not want to take sides in disagreements over whether someone is telling the truth or not. It is important to remember that mods are just volunteers who are trying to keep the forum running smoothly and fairly for everyone. Like I said earlier, if you are looking for someone to intervene in this situation, your best bet is to pursue legal procedures.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Provide some links, where and how did this happened? Did anyone warn you? Who is this member? Remember if you don't hold the private key, you don't own any coin, so practically this is your words against his. Without more information we can't help much, 10,000 BTC is too much money to just entrust to some random anonymous individual on the internet.
